thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 3 of 132
thread.title: Tiffany Hinton

author: Tiffany Hinton
title: Tiffany Hinton
text: Our first dog sitter did not care for my girl correctly. He didn't read my note outlining her medication, so he overdosed her. He didn't pay attention to her and she came back with her nose completely ripped up. Second experience was amazing. She was a last minute emergency situation. She was excellent and very loving. Be cautious of someone who takes on multiple families as once.
